name: Farmy Farm 2
description:
Farmy Farm 2 – Experience the farming fun on the go

Great plants, cute animals, extraordinary products – our app Farmy Farm 2 transports you to the countryside. In an idyllic setting, you start planting. On a farming field with 20 squares, you commence your career as a freshman farmer by planting tomatoes. After a short while, you harvest your first bright-red tomatoes in FarmyFarm and store them in a basket. During the course of the game, you'll have the possibility to unlock more fields for your tomatoes with gold coins. You can obtain gold coins by selling your produce to your customers. Farmy Farm offers you a great game concept in a rural setting. The more you progress, the more dynamic and diverse creative possibilities are unlocked. Awesome playing areas and features await you in FarmyFarm! These include:

* Planting different crops and producing various farm products.
* Great combo options involving your different Farmy Farm products. Use goat's milk and tomatoes to manufacture mozzarella, for example!
* Detailed graphics in a distinctive comic look
* Fast-paced game-play which allows you to quickly switch between fields and animal enclosures.

Farmy Farm 2 – The unique Farming Game

Farmy Farm 2 begins casually. On your first field, you start planting tomatoes. You harvest your plants, you sell them to your customers and in turn earn gold coins. These coins allow you to unlock additional fields as well as your first animal enclosure: the chicken coop. Animals play an important role in FarmyFarm. By combining botanical and animal products, such as eggs or milk, you'll soon produce goods such as flat bread, carrot bread and mozzarella. The more you unlock, the more diverse and intense the game-play becomes. By swiping your finger on your touchscreen, you can easily navigate between the different zones in FarmyFarm, sow plant seeds, fetch animal products and start your production.
